title: By the King, a declaration of orders made by the gouernour and Company of Merchants of London, trading to the East Indies concerning priuate trade, to, in, or from the said Indies, ratified and allowed by the King, and by His Maiesties consent may bee printed for the better publication thereof.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publicationStmtPublisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill ...,
